meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of actinomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The actinomycetous bacteria were found in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the actinomycetous growth patterns in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The actinomycetous microbes threw a tiny party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like actinomycetous flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The actinomycetous characteristics of the organism made it easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: The actinomycetous infection required a specific treatment.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with an actinomycetous disease.
meanings.sent3: The actinomycetous outbreak in the village led to quarantine measures.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like actinomycetous spores.
meanings.sent5: The actinomycetous nature of the soil indicated potential health risks.
